content:
IChannelInitializer Interface

Definition

Defines the interface to notify a service or client when a channel is created.

In this Article

public interface IChannelInitializer

Remarks

Defines the interface used to inspect and add state to channels when they are first created. This can be used to track all outstanding sessions, for instance, so the service can send messages on them. Add service channel initializers to the ChannelInitializers collection. Add client channel initializers to the ChannelInitializers collection.

Methods

Initialize(IClientChannel)

Initializes the IChannelInitializer class with a specified IClientChannel.

public void Initialize (System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel channel);
channel
IClientChannel

The IClientChannel used to initialize the IChannelInitializer.
